mapper.insert: INSERT INTO J_COUNSEL (JOBNO, JOBSKILL, LASTCONS, PROGRESS, SUC_U, INITCONS, JOBEX, IAPDATE, STEPAPPRO, EXPDATE, CLINIC, JOBWANT, SALWANT) VALUES ( #{counselJobNo}, #{counselJobSkill}, #{counselLastCons}, #{counselProgress}, #{counselSUCS}, #{counselInItCons}, #{counselJobEX}, #{counselIAPDate}, #{counselStepPro}, #{counselEXPDate}, #{counselClinic}, #{counselJobWant}, #{counselSalWant} )
